title: AGRICULTURAL SCIENCE (DOUBLE MAJOR)
utme_requirements:
SSC credit passes in English Language and any three (3) of

 

1. Agricultural Science

2. Mathematics

3. Chemistry

4. Biology

5. Health Science

6. Integrated/Rural Science

7. Physics

8. Nature Study and

9. General Science.

 

NB

GROUP A:

1. Agricultural Science

2. Biology

3. Nutrition

4. Health Science.

5. Applied Biology

 

GROUP B:

1. Physics

2. Chemistry

3. Mathematics

4.Basic Mathematics/Arithmetic Process

5. Economics

6. Geography

7. Social Studies

8. Integrated Science

9. General Science
subjects: Agricultural Science, Chemistry, Biology/General Science or Mathematics.

title: ARABIC MEDIUM
utme_requirements: SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Arabic, Christian Religious Studies/Islamic Studies and any other subjects.
subjects: Arabic and two (2) subjects from Arts/Social Science

title: ARABIC/ENGLISH
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including Arabic and English Language, Mathematics, Literature in English, any other subject.
subjects: Arabic and two (2) subjects from Arts/Social Science

title: ARABIC/ISLAMIC STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Arabic, Islamic Studies and any other subject.
subjects: Arabic, Islamic Studies and any other Arts subject.

title: ARABIC/SOCIAL STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Arabic and two (2) of Economics, Government, Geography and Social studies
subjects: Arabic and any two (2) of Geography, History/ Government and Economics.

title: ARABIC/YORUBA
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Arabic, Yoruba and any other subject
subjects: Arabic, Yoruba and any other Arts subject.

title: BUSINESS EDUCATION
utme_requirements:
SSC credit passes or TC II merits in English Language and any three (3) of:

1. Economics

2. Accounts

3. Government

4. Geography

5. History

6. Business Method

7. Statistics

8. Commerce

9. Any Science subjects

 

NB: GROUP A:

Commercial Arithmetic Costing, Principles of Accounts, Book Keeping Mathematics, Statistics.

 

GROUP B:

Office Practice, Business Method, Commerce, Economics.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and any of Geography, Commerce and Principles of Accounts.

title: COMPUTER EDUCATION/ECONOMICS
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics, Physics and any other Science/Social Science subject.
subjects: Any three (3) of Economics, Mathematics/Physics and Chemistry.

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE EDUCATION/MATHEMATICS
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics and any two (2) Science subjects.
subjects: Mathematics and any other two (2) Science subjects.

title: ECONOMICS/MATHEMATICS
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other two (2) Social Science subject.
subjects: Economics, Mathematics and any other Social Science/Science subject.

title: ECONOMICS/SOCIAL STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics, Government/History and any other Social Science subject.
subjects: Economics, History/Government and any other Social Science subject.

title: ENGLISH (DOUBLE MAJOR)
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Literature in English and any other two (2) Arts subjects.
subjects: Literature in English and any two (2) Arts subjects.

title: ENGLISH/ISLAMIC STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Islamic Studies, Literature in English and any other Arts subject.
subjects: Islamic Studies, Literature in English and one (1) Arts subject.

title: ENGLISH/POLITICAL SCIENCE
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Literature in English, Government/History and any other Arts/Social Science subject.
subjects: Literature in English, Government/History and any other Arts/Social Science subject.

title: ENGLISH/SOCIAL STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Literature in English and any two (2) of Economics, Government/History, Geography/Social Studies.
subjects: Literature in English and any of Arts/Social Science subjects.

title: ENGLISH/YORUBA
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Literature in English, Yoruba and any Arts subject.
subjects: Literature in English, Yoruba and any Arts subjects

title: ISLAMIC STUDIES/ECONOMICS
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any one (1) Arts/Social Science subject.
subjects: Islamic Studies, Economics and any Arts/Social Science subject.

title: ISLAMIC STUDIES/SOCIAL STUDIES
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Islamic Studies and any two (2) of

1. Economics

2. Government/History

3. Geography
subjects: Islamic Studies, Government/History and any one (1)  Social/Arts Subject.

title: ISLAMIC STUDIES/YORUBA
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Islamic Studies, Yoruba and one (1)  Arts subject.
subjects: Yoruba, Islamic Studies and one (1)  Arts subject.

title: PHYSICAL & HEALTH EDUCATION
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credits/TC II merit passes in Five (5) subjects including English Language, Biology or its equivalent.
subjects: Biology and any two (2relevant subjects.

title: PRIMARY EDUCATION STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5)SSC credits including English Language.
subjects: English Language and any other three (3) subjects.

title: SOCIAL STUDIES/YORUBA
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Government/History, Yoruba, one (1)   Arts/Social Science subject.
subjects: Government/History, Yoruba, one (1) Arts/Social Science subject.

title: YORUBA/SOCIAL STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Government/History, Yoruba and one (1)   Arts/subject.
subjects: Yoruba, Government/History and one (1)Arts/Social Science.
